description:
FoCal enables you to create your personal photo calendar
FoCal is a free (as in freedom) Android application for keeping a Photo Calendar.

Import daily pictures, consistently journal about your life and enjoy a satisfying retrospective view of every month.

• Keep everything private and local, it is your personal calendar
• Display the app in dark or light theme
• Use photos from your gallery or enable direct camera imports
• Export and import your entire database for backup or migration
• Support 100% Free and Open Source software, with no proprietary dependencies
